pullRequest.title: Refactor Central Client and Central related commands
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Also refactored central-related command help texts & added a few test cases.

Fixes #
Approach

Describe how you are implementing the solutions along with the design details.

Samples

Also refactored central-related command help texts & added a few test cases.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: Refactor Central Client to remove dependency on ballerina-lang
Rafactor central commands & add unit tests

beforeCommit.message: Rafactor central commands & add unit tests

afterCommit.message: Rafactor central commands & add unit tests

@@ -1,18 +1,18 @@
 NAME
-       ballerina-pull - Fetch modules from Ballerina Central
+       ballerina-pull - Fetch packages from Ballerina Central
 
 SYNOPSIS
-       ballerina pull <org-name>/<module-name>[:<version>]
+       ballerina pull <org-name>/<package-name>[:<version>]
 
 
 DESCRIPTION
-       Pull downloads the specified module from Ballerina Central
-       along with its dependencies. It then caches this module at
+       Pull downloads the specified package from Ballerina Central
+       along with its dependencies. It then caches this package at

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,37 +1,32 @@
 NAME
-       ballerina-push - Push modules to Ballerina Central
+       ballerina-push - Push packages to Ballerina Central
 
 SYNOPSIS
-       ballerina push <module-name>
-       ballerina push (-a | --all)
+       ballerina push
 
 
 DESCRIPTION
-       Push command pushes the specified module to Ballerina Central repository or
-       if '-a' or '--all' option is specified, then push all the modules
-       in the current project.
+       Push command pushes the current project's package to Ballerina Central

@@ -1,37 +1,32 @@

        2) You will receive an access token with the registration, add it to
           the 'Settings.toml' in home repository (<USER_HOME>/.ballerina/).
